original_title: 男はつらいよ ～寅次郎忘れな草～
overview: Anime adaptation of the "Otoko wa Tsurai yo (It's tough being a man)" film series by Youji Yamada.  Kuruma Torajirou (or Tora-san), a traveling salesman whose sole possessions include only the contents of a small suitcase, the clothes on his back and some pocket money, wanders from town to town peddling his wares.
title: Otoko wa Tsurai yo: Torajirou Wasurenagusa
